channel.title: BigUpRadio.com BOOM SHOTS Reggae Dancehall Show
channel.description:
ATTENTION APPLE-ITUNES. THIS PODCAST IS LEGAL. PLEASE LIST ON YOUR ITUNES PODCASTS. ANY QUESTIONS PLEASE EMAIL INFO@BIGUPRADIO.COM.
The best reggae dancehall on the web for 8 years running BigUpRadio.com brings you the all new BOOM SHOTS reggae dancehall show hosted by DJ BOOM from Bassmentality Sound. Tune into the 24x7 Slamming Dancehall internet radio station every Wednesday 3am 9am 3pm 9pm EST and get the latest reggae dancehall releases mixed by a master. DJ Boom is here to mash up your Wednesdays!

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #106 with Alison Hinds
item.description: The "Queen of Soca" ALISON HINDS drops by this weeks SOCA TOUCH on Bigupradio.com. Hosted by DJ Boom, BOOM SHOTS is a weekly dancehall show that you can catch every Wednesday on Bigupradio's 24x7 Dancehall internet radio station. This week the beautiful ALISON HINDS stops by for an exclusive interview and to promote her newly released album "SOCA QUEEN." Hear new tracks from "SOCA QUEEN" and find out what's going on in her world. This is one show you'll want to catch!!! ONE LOVE

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #101
item.description: Bigup Radio, Inc., operators of the industry-leading BigUp Radio network of Reggae internet radio stations and leading web-site (www.bigupradio.com) for Reggae CDs, DVDs, vinyl, news and reviews, is pleased to announce the milestone 100th Episode of the Boom Shots show on BigUp Radio.

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #100 Anniversary Show
item.description: Bigup Radio, Inc., operators of the industry-leading BigUp Radio network of Reggae internet radio stations and leading web-site (www.bigupradio.com) for Reggae CDs, DVDs, vinyl, news and reviews, is pleased to announce the milestone 100th Episode of the Boom Shots show on BigUp Radio.

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #99 with Khari Kill
item.description: Dancehall sensation KHARI KILL guest stars on this weeks BOOM SHOTS on Bigupradio.com. Join your host DJ BOOM for a special interview and feature with reggae star Khari Kill . Khari Kill blew your mind with his wonderful track "Picture of Selassie" but he has so many more tunes you may not have heard. Don't miss this show! Tune in to BOOM SHOTS each and every Wednesday on Bigupradio.com Dancehall! ONE LOVE

item.description: BOOM SHOTS Dancehall Reggae this week brought to you by DJ BOOM of Bassmentality Sound on Bigupradio.com. Catch this dancehall reggae radio show every Wednesday on Bigupradio.com. ONE LOVE

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #97 with Jah Cure
item.description: The long awaited return of musical power house JAH CURE has arrived! JAH CURE guest stars on this weeks BOOM SHOTS on Bigupradio.com . Hosted by DJ Boom, BOOM SHOTS is a weekly dancehall show that you can catch every Wednesday on Bigupradio's 24x7 Dancehall internet radio station. JAH CURE hasn't let anything stop him from putting out sweet reggae tunes over these years he's been away. And now he has just released his new hit album "True Reflections" with VP Records. Tune in to find out what the upcoming CURE FEST 2007 and what JAH CURE is up to.

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #93 with Ziggy Marley
item.description: The one and only ZIGGY MARLEY guest stars on this weeks BOOM SHOTS on Bigupradio.com . Hosted by DJ Boom, BOOM SHOTS is a weekly dancehall show that you can catch every Wednesday on Bigupradio's 24x7 Dancehall internet radio station. Ziggy, the son of Bob Marley, has been dropping bombshell albums since the late 80's. Ya'll remember "Tomorrow People," "Conscious Party," "New Love" from way back, but now it's all about "Love Is My Religion." Tune in to find out what Ziggy is up to these days and when he will be on tour in your city. If you miss the show live you can always catch the Podcast on Yahoo. ONE LOVE

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #86 with Elephant Man
item.description: Bigupradio.com is proud to annouce the arrival of the "Energy God" Elephant Man as a special guest on this weeks BOOM SHOTS. Hosted by DJ Boom, BOOM SHOTS is a weekly dancehall show that you can catch every Wednesday on Bigupradio's 24x7 Dancehall internet radio station. Elephant Man is now on the massive label Bad Boy Entertainment...that's right P Diddy is in the house! Hear the smash hit "Five-O" with the the legendary Wyclef. Tune in for a specail Elephant Man interview and mixset by DJ BOOM!

item.title: BOOM SHOTS #85 with Seanizzle
item.description: This week mega producer Sean Reid aka SEANIZZLE drops by BOOM SHOTS to chop it up with DJ BOOM. This very talented producer is responisible for many of the hottest tracks and riddims in the dancehall world today. Seanizzle has worked with top artists like Beenie Man, Ninja Man, Devonte, Delly Ranx, Busy Signal and many more. He's put out the hot riddims "Reverse," "Stepfather," "Impact," "Fast Lane" and the "Klamputae." Stay tuned for this exclusive interview and feature with theon this weeks BOOM SHOTS!
